item.title: Comments via github
item.description: It is now possible for you to add comments to this site via github issues and utterances. Once you have authorised utterances to comment on your behalf you will be able to comment on any piece of content on this site. Feel free to say hello below. Why all the fuss? This whole website has been generated using hugo. A static site generator. Hugo takes a series of articles and combines these with a set of HTML templates and produces HTML.

item.title: Welcome! to the home of mikepro
item.description: Hallo, Bonjour, Witam, Ciao, こんにちは, Hello and welcome. You have reached the personal site of github user mikepro otherwise known as Michael. A web developer and user of emacs. One of my main aims with this website is to introduce emacs in a friendly and approachable way. Emacs has a fearsome reputation of having a step learning curve and being difficult to use. I can still remember the first time I opened up emacs (way back in 2001) and how overwhelmed I felt taking my first frustrating steps, getting confused, getting annoyed with cryptic keyboard shortcuts and not understanding what I was doing.
